mapper.update: update machinery set machineryStatus=#{machineryStatus} where machineryID=#{machineryID}
mapper.select: SELECT *,(SELECT SUM(confirm_area) from work where machinery.machinery_id = work_machinery_id) as confirm_area, (SELECT username FROM user where machinery.machinery_owner = user_id) as username, (SELECT phone FROM user where machinery.machinery_owner = user_id) as phone FROM machinery
SELECT m.*,u.* from machinery m LEFT JOIN user u on m.machinery_owner=u.user_id where m.machinery_no=#{machineryNO}

select *,(SELECT SUM(confirm_area) from work where machinery.machinery_id = work_machinery_id) as confirm_area, (SELECT username FROM user where machinery.machinery_owner = user_id) as username, (SELECT phone FROM user where machinery.machinery_owner = user_id) as phone from machinery where machinery_owner in (SELECT user_id from user where dept_id = #{deptId})
SELECT DISTINCT* from machinery GROUP BY machinery_no
SELECT DISTINCT* from machinery where machinery_owner in (SELECT user_id from user where dept_id = #{deptId}) GROUP BY machinery_no
